title: Stripe: How to Access Your Stripe Secret Key
summary: This page provides a step-by-step guide for FlexPay users on how to access their Stripe Secret Key. It explains that this key is necessary for FlexPay's real-time recovery of failed payments and outlines the process of retrieving it from the Stripe dashboard.
key_points: FlexPay requires your Stripe Secret Key for failed payment recovery.
Access your Stripe Secret Key via the 'Developers' > 'API keys' section in your Stripe dashboard.
Reveal your live secret key and copy it to send to the FlexPay team.
The secret key enables real-time recovery for payment failures.
